title: [6.0.0.a]cannot edit text files after login
body:
### expected behaviour
built in text editor should always work with text files.

### actual behaviour
after login to owncloud, text files cannot be edited with the built in text editor.
text files are downloaded when clicked.
after hitting f5 to refresh the page the editor works.
not working again if i logout and login again.

### steps to reproduce
1. login to owncloud
2. click on textfile (it will download instead of opening the editor
3. refresh page (f5)
4. works as it should
5. reproduce again: logout -> refresh -> login

### server configuration
operating system: debian squeeze

web server: lighttpd 1.4.33

database: mysql  ver 14.14 distrib 5.1.72

php version: php 5.3.3-7+squeeze18

owncloud version: 6.0.0a

fresh install

list of activated app: all default

the content of config/config.php: (without the database password and passwordsalt)
$config = array (
  'instanceid' => 'oc4aa8898a83',

  'dbtype' => 'mysql',

windows 7
